title: is there a moment in the year that we can change our accounts from servers?
body:
One of my friends from college told me that Riot let players change their account from serves, i was going to spend the 20 bucks, but if i have to wait for it to be free i would i'm just asking if there's an opportunity in the year.

i play in here in NA i have a ping of 78-80 but if i change to LAN i would be at 20-30.
(i'm from Puerto Rico BTW)

replies.body: Aside from making an account on another server, an existing account can transfer through the in-game store.  We don't currently have specials or free transfers, but any changes on that will surely be provided on the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page. Hope that helps!
